analysis.description:
SaleToken.systemAddress (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#366-367) shadows:
	- AccessControl.systemAddress (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#172)

SaleToken.nonces (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#365-366) shadows:
	- AccessControl.nonces (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#175-176)
SignatureVerifier.splitSignature (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#10-32) is declared view but contains assembly code
SignatureVerifier.verifyString (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#34-107) is declared view but contains assembly code

SaleToken.fallback (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#450-461) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#460)

SaleToken.withdrawDekla (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#501-507) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_withdrawWallet,_amount) (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol)

SignatureVerifier.splitSignature uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#10-32)
	- /unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#22-32

SignatureVerifier.verifyString uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#34-107)
	- /unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#47-55
	- /unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#86-87
	- /unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#96-98

AccessControl.systemAddress should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#172)
SaleToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#360-361)
SaleToken.getNonces (/unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol#418-421) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xb28bf5232f743c61f8c8f0db7b89ba88447261da.sol:
